title: Kotak Mahindra Bank bets on deeper ties with customers
description: Kotak Mahindra Bank addresses the impact of RBI embargo on margins and unsecured loan business. Plans for branch expansion and deposit mobilization initiatives are in progress. Current accounts and savings share decreases while average deposits see an increase.
